name: TAX AVOIDANCE
description: This is a corporate tax game. The essence of tax contradiction lies in the game between tax collectors and payers on "how much tax to pay". In the actual tax related business, the rules of the tax game often take the absolute power controller as the leader of the game. Therefore, for taxpayers, if they want to play the "tax game" well and become a winner, they must constantly improve and understand the "playing skill" of the game rules in the game rules formulated by the leader without choice, And on the premise of deeply understanding the intention and "playing method" of the game maker, let yourself not foul and be eliminated in the game. In this game, you will become the CEO of a company established in 2008. At this time, the subprime mortgage crisis in the United States has erupted, a huge dark cloud has enveloped investors all over the world, and the world financial system is facing an unprecedented storm. When the company's business cannot be expanded, you will take the company out of the quagmire of the financial crisis and return to the right track of rapid development through a series of reasonable tax avoidance means.
